recipesJson.name: That Green Juice for Neefrit06 (White Grapefruit Grape Pear juice)
recipesJson.author: QueerYourVape
recipesJson.description:
Today in SaturDIY'ing with fresh03 and Friends! We were doing a Wishing Well: Doctors Without Borders! and Neefrit06 asked for a grapefruit, grape and pear juice and I went a little sideways. I hope it turns out lovely and juicy.

Enjoy, be queer and vape on!

C. aka Queer Your Vape

[Photo credits: pumpsandiron.com]
